arts.ttl: Gavi responds to Barcelona youngster’s breakout performance vs Villarreal
arts.sum: Barcelona star Gavi has tonight taken to social media, to send a message of support to teammate Pablo Torre. Youngster Torre, of course, is fresh off an evening to remember.…

arts.ttl: Robert Lewandowski and Raphinha bag braces as Barcelona blow away Villarreal
arts.sum: The Poland striker missed a penalty as Barca ran riot.

arts.ttl: ‘Gives everything for the club’ – Hansi Flick hails Barcelona star after Villarreal romp
arts.sum: Barcelona head coach Hansi Flick has on Sunday moved to lavish praise on a leading member of his attacking ranks. As much comes fresh off Barcelona making it a perfect…

arts.ttl: Barcelona maintains perfect run thanks to a "very painful" victory over Villarreal
arts.sum: The Catalans sit comfortably at the top of the standings, showcasing their attacking talent, although the match was overshadowed by a serious injury to goalkeeper Marc-André ter Stegen . Villarreal thought they had taken an early lead when Alex Baena scored, but his goal was disallowed for offside.

arts.ttl: Barcelona star admits he ‘can’t enjoy’ win over Villarreal
arts.sum: A key contributor in Barcelona’s victory over Villarreal on Sunday evening has admitted post-match that he finds himself unable to ‘enjoy’ the result. The player in question? Raphinha. Wide-man Raphinha…

arts.ttl: Barca hit 5 past Villarreal, stay perfect in LaLiga
arts.sum: Forwards Robert Lewandowski and Raphinha both scored twice to help Barcelona thrash hosts Villarreal 5-1 on Sunday as the visitors maintained their perfect start in LaLiga with a sixth consecutive victory.

arts.ttl: Villarreal 1-5 Barcelona: Highlights, man of the match, stats from La Liga clash
arts.sum: Robert Lewandowski and Raphinha both score twice as Barcelona record a 5-1 win over Villarreal in La Liga on Sunday night.

arts.ttl: Barcelona star suffers serious injury during Villarreal clash
arts.sum: A headline member of the first-team ranks at La Liga giants Barcelona has on Sunday suffered what looks like a serious injury. The player in question? Marc-André ter Stegen. Hansi…

arts.ttl: ACL fears as Barcelona star suffers serious-looking injury against Villarreal
arts.sum: Barcelona goalkeeper Marc-Andre ter Stegen suffers a serious-looking knee injury the first half of Sunday's La Liga game against Villarreal.

arts.ttl: Barcelona youngster announces himself with gorgeous nutmeg assist vs Villarreal
arts.sum: An up-and-coming member of the midfield ranks at La Liga giants Barcelona has on Sunday announced himself once and for all to the club’s fanbase. The player in question? Pablo…
